data.katex: \brand{\div R} \ | \ P = I^2 R \ | \ \brand{\div R} \\ \frac{P}{R} = \frac{I^2 \cancel{R}}{\cancel{R}} \\ \boxed{\frac{P}{R} = I^2}

data.katex: \brand{\div I^2} \ | \ P = I^2 R \ | \ \brand{\div I^2} \\ \frac{P}{I^2} = \frac{\cancel{I^2} R}{\cancel{I^2}} \\ \boxed{\frac{P}{I^2} = R}

children.storageKey: $$ \brand{\div I^2} \ | \ P = I^2 R \ | \ \brand{\div I^2} \\ \frac{P}{I^2} = \frac{\cancel{I^2} R}{\cancel{I^2}} \\ \boxed{\frac{P}{I^2} = R} $$
